titleStmt.title: An epitaph vpon the death of the honorable, syr Edward Saunders Knight, Lorde cheefe Baron of the Exchequer, who dyed the. 19. of Nouember. 1576
titleStmt.author: Lloyd, Lodowick, fl. 1573-1610.

publicationStmt.publisher: By H. S[ingleton] for Henry Disle, dwellyng at the southwest doore of Saint Paules Church, and are there to be solde,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "You Muses weare your mourning weedes, strike on the fatal drome,".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
